title: The Ernest & Fanny Miracle Hour
description: Every episode, Ernest and Fanny read some passages from the good book. And just possibly, they will heal some of their sickly and/or crippled followers. Includes their disastrous TV special Ernest & Fanny’s Exorcism Tonight.
quote: Oh, Foo Foo says, ‘God bless you, everyone.’
altHero: Ernest Weller and Fanny Ray Weller
alt1: Ernest sitting at a desk and holding a Bible
alt2: Fanny Ray sitting and holding a pink miniature poodle
alt3: audience members holding up signs, one reads “John 3:11” and another reads “lakers 116, Celtics 112”
alt4: Ernest and Fanny Ray dancing with arms raised as a possessed woman is tied to a bucking bed
